detail.description: Incorporated in 2023, Sanofi Consumer Healthcare India Ltd manufactures and trading of drugs & pharmaceutical products.[1]It is a division of Sanofi, a global pharmaceutical company, focusing on over-the-counter (OTC) and consumer healthcare products. [2]
